title: The Boozy Blender
description:
The Boozy Blender By Mark Scarbrough, Bruce Weinstein

2015 | 128 Pages | ISBN: 0804186707 | EPUB | 4 MB


Blender + Ice + Booze = Party!

This whimsical salute to flavor and ice reinvents 60 classic cocktails. From simple to sophisticated, these blender drinks focus on fresh ingredients and are perfect for any occasion, every season, and all settingsÃ¢â‚¬â€deck, hearth, lounge, tailgate, or just at home. Recipes include:
